sub_title: Strategic Global Leader | Transformational CEO | Board Advisor | Cybersecurity & AI Evangelist | Driving M&A and Corporate Ventures | Empowering Global Sales & Operations | Championing SaaS and IoT Innovation
summary:
Welcome to my LinkedIn profile!

Enthusiastic about the dynamic intersection of people and technology, I am a strategic international executive with a demonstrated and successful track record in B2B environments. 

My expertise spans across diverse geographies including Europe, Asia, North Africa, South America, and the Middle East, where I have shouldered full P&L responsibilities. 

My professional journey encompasses a range of impactful areas:

➣ Global Expansion Maestro: Orchestrating international expansion efforts that drive growth and market penetration.
➣ Venture Catalyst: Nurturing corporate ventures that spur innovation and fuel transformative outcomes.
➣ M&A Navigator: Guiding strategic mergers and acquisitions initiatives that propel businesses forward.
➣ Champion of New Business Frontiers: Pioneering new avenues of growth through innovative business development.
➣ Architect of Global Operations: Crafting and managing seamless global operations for enhanced efficiency.

Known for my magnetic charisma, boundless energy, and inspirational leadership style, I am hailed by colleagues as an empowering business leader who thrives on fostering customer relationships and championing team success through impeccable interpersonal communication.

Fluently multilingual (English, Spanish, French…), I am rooted in a multicultural background, having resided in various countries across Europe and Asia. This immersion has enriched my ability to navigate diverse markets and forge connections across borders.

Beyond my core pursuits, I serve as an invaluable Advisory Board Member, offering sagacious insights into International Business Development, Go-To-Market Strategy, Product Management, Organizational Structure, and Talent Management. 

My commitment extends beyond the boardroom, as I wholeheartedly volunteer at Forward Inc. Here, I take the stage to deliver impactful keynotes, mentor burgeoning entrepreneurs, and coach emerging startups and scale-ups in their global business odyssey.

Serving as a dedicated Board Member at Amnesty Rotterdam, my personal passions converge around sustainability, energy transition, inclusion, and fostering tangible social impact.

If my journey and aspirations resonate with you, let's embark on a meaningful connection that transcends conventional networking norms.

awards.title: The Netherlands Enterprise Awards 2017 Winner
awards.description:
Best Pumping Equipment Manufacturer & Rotating Equipment Services Provider 2017
https://issuu.com/aiglobalmedia/docs/2017_netherlands_enterprise_awards/7

This prestigious award marks you out as one of the most outstanding performers in your field and we hope that this will go a long way in helping you achieve even greater results over the coming months and years.
 
Our voting, selection and judging process took over 3 months, during which time our industry experts counted and researched votes, and analysed all supporting evidence to ensure that only the most deserving and top performing individuals, firms and products were recognised.

profile_positions.description:
As General Manager, I spearhead our company's international expansion throughout Europe and the Middle East, driving strategic initiatives across Corporate Ventures (M&A), Institutional Relationships, Talent Attraction, and International Business Development.

At S2 Grupo, a global leader in Cyber Security and Security Managed Services, our mission is to empower individuals and organizations to proactively combat cyber threats and enhance their cyber resilience. 

We specialize in end-to-end solutions, spanning from conceptualizing and constructing cutting-edge Security Operations Centers (SOC) to wielding expertise in safeguarding Industrial and Operational Technology (OT) against cyber risks.

Notably, we orchestrate impactful awareness campaigns, reaching over 25,000 individuals annually, transforming them into invaluable "Human Firewalls" in the ever-evolving realm of cybersecurity.

Our sterling reputation is endorsed by Fortune 500 enterprises and governmental bodies worldwide, who entrust us with safeguarding their critical systems and infrastructures. Our holistic service portfolio encompasses:

➣ Proactive Monitoring & Precise Threat Detection
➣ Swift Incident Response & Targeted Threat Hunting
➣ Actionable Threat Intelligence for Informed Decision-making
➣ Innovative Detection Engineering to Stay Ahead of Threats
➣ People-Centric Security Strategies for Comprehensive Defense
➣ Enabling Governance, Risk Management & Compliance Adherence
➣ Conducting In-depth Advanced Security Audits

💾 Explore further by downloading our comprehensive corporate brochure below.
profile_positions.title: General Manager Europe

profile_positions.description:

I advise the founders and share expertise on go-to-market strategy, international business development, organisation and people.
profile_positions.title: Advisory Board Member

profile_positions.description:
At TV Bio we believe that a change is possible and that there are many ways to eat, learn and consume.

I advise the founders and share expertise on digital transformation, new business development, international expansion and operational excellence.
profile_positions.title: Advisory Board Member

profile_positions.description:
President of the Management Board. Leading the global expansion of the company. Deployed operations and relocated headquarters from Poland to The Netherlands. 

✔ Grew revenues by 25% in 2020 vs 2019
✔ Grew opportunities pipeline by 223% (from 1,5 M€ to 5 M€) in H2 2020
✔ Reduced monthly burn rate by 27% (from 150k€ to 110k€) in H2 2020
✔ Raised 0,76 M€ funds (series A extension) in January 2021
✔ Selected for the X-Europe 2021 programme (AI & Machine Learning)

⇨  ReliaSol is a Best-in-Class and successful scaling up company offering AI based predictive maintenance solutions
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description:
Global Head of Enterprise Division EMEA. Lead sales (end user and channel), financial controlling,  product management, marketing communication and manufacturing functions (300+ associates). 

Responsible for three global manufacturing locations in Denmark, Italy, and Hungary. Full P&L responsibility ($130M+). Reports to the global executive board.

✔ Achieved organic growth rate of 4,4% in 2019 
✔ Achieved EBITDA improvement of 10% (from 13,4% to 14,4%) in 2019

⇨ Belden (NYSE:BDC) is a global leader (US headquartered) specialized in signal transmission (cabling and networking) and security solutions for mission-critical applications in enterprise and industrial markets.
profile_positions.title: Vice President & General Manager | Head of Enterprise Division EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Global head of the Turbo Services Business Unit (aftermarket services on steam turbines and compressors) for the EMEA region. Full P&L responsibility on several legal entities. Total annual turnover: +$80M. Total headcount: 200+ people. 

✔ Successfully turned around the business: achieved +21% growth in 2017 of which more than 10% in new customers and new geographies.

✔ Successfully integrated and merged legal entities and acquisitions, boosted synergies and collaboration.

✔ Significantly improved profitability, productivity and operational excellence above targets and expectations (gross profit, productive hours, on time delivery, warranty claims, overtime, absenteeism rate...)

⇨ Sulzer (SWX: SUN) is a global leader specialized in pumping solutions and rotating equipment maintenance and services (repairs, maintenance, retrofits, reverse engineering, performance improvement, energy efficiency and spare parts delivery for pumps, turbines, compressors, alternators and generators)
profile_positions.title: Managing Director (EMEA)

profile_positions.description:
Business Unit General Manager. Full P&L Responsibility on Industrial Automation product lines and customers across South-Korea and Mongolia. Annual turnover $50M. Headcount: 50+ people (sales, marketing, engineering, delivery). 

✔ Successfully turned around the business: from -12,3% in 2013 to +4,5% sales growth in 2015 (+3,7pts net margin recovery)

✔ Developed new business: grew Solution Business by +35% in 2015

✔ Successfully integrated Proface Korea ltd (Post-Merging Acquisition): developed synergies, Increased customer’s satisfaction, Boosted employee’s engagement

✔ Drastically improved productivity, performance and resources balancing: optimized organization and span of control, improved gender balance, diversity and cross-mobility 

⇨ Schneider-Electric (EPA:SU) is a Fortune 500 global leader in industrial and building automation, power management and energy efficiency
profile_positions.title: Vice President (Northeast-Asia)

profile_positions.description:
Leading Sales, Marketing and Business Development for Industrial and Infrastructure end-markets (Water treatment, Mining, Metal, Automotive, Food&Beverage...). Annual turnover:  $62M. Headcount: 30+ team members. 

✔ Grew sales by +5,2% annually (CAGR), Successfully integrated and merged acquisitions (Telvent, Abengoa group)

✔ Developed new business and international business: Adelaide (Australia) desalinization plant ($16M), Atotonilco (Mexico) Waste Water treatment plant ($9M)

✔ Increased customer intimacy and share of wallet with strategic accounts and end-users, Completed set-up and leadership of a dedicated team of 7 key accounts managers

⇨ Schneider-Electric (EPA:SU) is a Fortune 500 global leader in industrial and building automation, power management and energy efficiency
profile_positions.title: Sales Director (Spain)

profile_positions.description:
Leading global business development in water infrastructure, environment, and marine end-markets. Annual turnover $42M. 

✔ Grew sales by +12,3% annually (CAGR)

✔ Successfully integrated and merged acquisitions (Telvent, Abengoa)

✔ Developed new business: Spanish navy submarines switchboards modernization ($13,9M)

⇨ Schneider-Electric (EPA:SU) is a Fortune 500 global leader in industrial and building automation, power management and energy efficiency
profile_positions.title: Business Development Director (Spain)

profile_positions.description:
Strategically managed operations and portfolio of internal organisation projects, ensuring proper completion of all lifecycles.

✔ Provided expert management of human resources, internal procedures, and process improvements.

✔ Elevated performance in the areas of cost management, profitability, productivity, accounting, and invoicing.

✔ Conceptualised and rolled-out Enterprise Resources Planning (ERP) and Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems.

✔ Managed deployment of ISO 9001:2000 standards, and personal data safeguarding procedures in alignment with “LOPD” Spanish regulation.

✔ Completed set-up and leadership of engineering and after-sales services departments.

⇨ Infoport is delivering engineering, IT services,  software development, harbor and logistics operations management solutions
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager - Deputy General Manager

profile_positions.description:
Director and Legal Representative of French Subsidiary of Tissat S.A. Full P&L responsibility.

✔ Headed deployment of first company subsidiary outside of Spain, encompassing human resources selection

✔ Established administrative / legal procedures for operating in France, selected location and offices

✔ Successfully developed and grew new business within highly competitive French market: +69,7% CAGR

✔ Raised public funds and projects subventions by European Commission  ($500K, e-Content programme)

⇨ Tissat S.A. delivers IT services,  software development , Internet, e-commerce and data-centers solutions. Shareholders: IBM, Telefonica

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: International Project Manager

volunteer_experiences.description:
Forward·Inc is a global organization devoted to helping newcomers pursue their entrepreneurial dreams. 

As a mentor, I assist aspiring entrepreneurs with everything from concept development and becoming pitch-ready to implementing marketing strategies and scaling their businesses.

In particular, I support the entrepreneur in goal setting, give strategic & business development advice, develop the soft skills of the entrepreneur, and connect the entrepreneur to my business networks.
Funding member in 1999 and president since 2007 of the Association of former students of Supélec in Spain and Portugal. (Supélec Ibérica Alumni, 240 members)

Eva Connections offers professional and unique solutions to develop and support women at all phases of their career and development.

Specialties: Networking, Events, Wellbeing, Careers, Community, Personal Development, Leadership, Women in Leadership, Career Women, Women, Mentoring, Coaching, Training, Career Development, and Collaboration

www.huiwork.es (Coworking, Start-up business incubator)

Providing business and career advice to young entrepreneurs. Public speeches.
Greenpeace is a people-powered movement fighting for a green and peaceful future for our oceans, forests, food, climate and democracy.

Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) is an international, independent, medical humanitarian organisation that delivers emergency aid to people affected by armed conflict, epidemics, natural disasters and exclusion from healthcare. MSF offers assistance to people based on need, irrespective of race, religion, gender or political affiliation.
Amnesty International is a global movement of more than 7 million people who take injustice personally. We are campaigning for a world where human rights are enjoyed by all.
In Habitat for Humanity we believe that every person should have a decent, safe and affordable place to live. We build and repair houses all over the world using volunteer labor and donations.
